QuestData.Title: Heart of the Nightmare
QuestData.Description: I know only that my husband is somewhere deeper in this twisted forest.$b$bHe is still alive, but it remains to be seen if he is whole.$b$b<Tyrande's expression hardens into a scowl as she peers at you.>$b$bElune herself cannot protect Xavius if he is not.
QuestData.LogDescription: Track Malfurion's path through the Nightmare.
